漢羅台文: 原住民族電視台佮客家電視台嘛有相關的委員會咧支持，
台羅: guân-tsū-bîn-tso̍k tiān-sī-tâi kah Kheh-ka tiān-sī-tâi mā ū siong-kuan ê uí-uân-huē teh tsi-tshî,
台羅數字調: guan5-tsu7-bin5-tsok8 tian7-si7-tai5 kah4 kheh4-ka1 tian7-si7-tai5 ma7 u7 siong1-kuan1 e5 ui2-uan5-hue7 teh4 tsi1-tshi5,
白話字: goân-chū-bîn-cho̍k tiān-sī-tâi kah Kheh-ka tiān-sī-tâi mā ū siong-koan ê úi-oân-hōe teh chi-chhî,
